Articles.Content:
Hello kerbonauts!

It's a while I play KSP and never "landed" on the forum, altough I read a lot of it while making the first steps into the game.

So I wish to indistinctly thank all the forum users for the help I had from their contributions.

And obviously Squad for carrying on this terrific project!! I can certainly say this is the best videogame I ever played!
Hello, and welcome aboard!  The people here on the forums are, indeed, a great group of people.

Hello l0k0 and welcome to the forum!

I'm pleased that you decided to join and glad to hear you've found the forum helpful.  I hope you enjoy your time here.

Happy landings!

I was pretty much the same... I've been playing since almost forever (started on 0.8.something on my windows machine... eventually that died and I moved to Mac) but decided to join to forums quite recently. The community seems to be pretty good. Enjoy.
